title: Q&A with Rainforest Alliance's Tensie Whelan
summary: In April 2011, the Rainforest Alliance and Citi Foundation joined forces to host a Sustainable Value Chain Finance Workshop in New York City. In light of a new report funded by the Citi Foundation summarizing the workshop's outcomes, Rainforest Alliance president Tensie Whelan sheds some light on sustainable value chain finance, and explains why it's key to the Rainforest Alliance's work.
